DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety effectiveness low carbohydrate diet ( Atkins Diet ) high carbohydrate diet ( conventional USDA diet ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Efficacy Low High Carbohydrate Diets
DOC.detailed_description: Despite considerable mass appeal popular diet book , diet approach lack data support efficacy safety . Despite widespread use 30 year , Atkins diet never evaluate large , randomize , control trial . This study assess short-term long-term clinical effect low-carbohydrate diet high-carbohydrate diet overweight obese men woman . Participants study randomly assign Atkins diet ( low-carbohydrate , unlimited fat protein ) conventional USDA diet ( high-carbohydrate , low fat ) . The study evaluate effect dietary approach change : 1 ) weight body composition , 2 ) metabolic organ function , 3 ) exercise tolerance . Each participant enrol study 2 year .
